column4: can someone try sudo apt-get update and upgrade, see if they get the message : "The following packages have been kept back: linux-generic linux-headers-generic linux-image-generic, linux-restricted-modules-generic"

can someone try sudo apt-get update and upgrade (IN JAUNTY), see if they get the message : "The following packages have been kept back: linux-generic linux-headers-generic linux-image-generic, linux-restricted-modules-generic"
